hours_of_operation.emergency: For after-hours emergencies, call 911 or visit the nearest ER

location_details.directions: Located in the downtown medical district, two blocks from City Hall. Turn left at Main Street and we're on the right side.
location_details.parking: Free parking is available behind the main building. Enter from Elm Street. We also have handicap-accessible parking spaces near the main entrance.
location_details.public_transport: Served by bus routes 12, 45, and 67. The nearest metro station is Medical Center Station (5-minute walk).
location_details.accessibility: Our facility is fully wheelchair accessible with ramps and elevators. We have accessible restrooms and examination rooms.

accepted_insurance.policy: We accept most major insurance plans. Please call us to verify if your specific plan is accepted.
accepted_insurance.verification: We recommend calling your insurance provider before your visit to verify coverage and benefits.

accepted: Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover)
payment_methods.payment_plans: We offer payment plans for eligible patients. Please speak with our billing department to discuss options.

billing_policies.copay: Copays are due at the time of service. Please bring your insurance card and photo ID.
billing_policies.self_pay: Self-pay patients receive a 15% discount when paying in full at the time of service.
billing_policies.billing_questions: For billing inquiries, contact our billing department at +1-555-123-4568 (Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM).
billing_policies.statements: Billing statements are sent monthly. You can also access your account online through our patient portal.

cost_estimates.note: Actual costs may vary. Contact our billing department for specific pricing.

general_consultation.description: For general health concerns, routine checkups, or minor illnesses

follow_up.description: For follow-up on previous conditions or test results

physical_exam.description: Comprehensive physical examination and health assessment

specialist_consultation.description: Detailed consultation for complex or specialized health issues

scheduling.how_to_schedule: You can schedule appointments by calling +1-555-123-4567, through our website, or via our mobile app.
scheduling.same_day: Same-day appointments may be available for urgent concerns. Call us in the morning for best availability.
scheduling.advance_booking: We recommend booking 1-2 weeks in advance for routine appointments.
scheduling.preferred_times: Morning appointments (8-10 AM) and late afternoon appointments (4-6 PM) fill up quickly.

cancellation_policy.notice_required: Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling.
cancellation_policy.late_cancellation_fee: Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice may incur a $50 fee.
cancellation_policy.no_show_fee: No-show appointments will be charged a $75 fee.
cancellation_policy.how_to_cancel: Cancel or reschedule by calling +1-555-123-4567 or through the patient portal.
cancellation_policy.emergency_exception: Emergency situations are handled on a case-by-case basis.

late_arrival_policy.policy: Please arrive 15 minutes before your scheduled appointment time.
late_arrival_policy.late_arrival: If you arrive more than 15 minutes late, we may need to reschedule your appointment.
late_arrival_policy.check_in: Check in at the front desk with your insurance card and ID.
late_arrival_policy.first_time_patients: First-time patients should arrive 30 minutes early to complete paperwork.

recommended: Previous medical records (if from another provider)

first_visit.arrival_time: Arrive 30 minutes early to complete registration and paperwork.
first_visit.paperwork: Download and complete forms from our website before your visit to save time.
first_visit.medical_history: Be prepared to discuss your complete medical history, including family history.
first_visit.current_medications: Bring a list of all medications, supplements, and vitamins you currently take.
first_visit.insurance_verification: We'll verify your insurance coverage when you check in.

before_appointment.fasting: Some tests require fasting. We'll inform you in advance if this is necessary.
before_appointment.medications: Continue taking your regular medications unless instructed otherwise.
before_appointment.questions: Write down any questions or concerns to discuss with your provider.
before_appointment.symptoms: Keep track of any symptoms, including when they started and what makes them better or worse.

current_policies.masking: Masks are optional but recommended in our waiting areas and exam rooms.
current_policies.screening: Temperature checks may be conducted at entry during flu season or outbreaks.
current_policies.sick_policy: If you have COVID-19 symptoms, please call ahead so we can arrange appropriate precautions.
current_policies.vaccination: We offer COVID-19 vaccinations. Call to schedule or check for walk-in availability.

telehealth.availability: Telehealth appointments available for appropriate conditions.
telehealth.how_to_schedule: Select 'telehealth' option when booking online or mention it when calling.
telehealth.requirements: You'll need a smartphone, tablet, or computer with camera and internet connection.
telehealth.suitable_for: Follow-ups, medication management, minor concerns, mental health visits.

common_questions.new_patients: Yes, we are accepting new patients. Call +1-555-123-4567 to schedule your first appointment.
common_questions.walk_ins: We accept walk-ins based on availability, but scheduled appointments receive priority. Call ahead to check wait times.
common_questions.prescriptions: Prescription refills can be requested through our patient portal, by phone, or during your appointment.
common_questions.test_results: Most test results are available within 3-5 business days. We'll call with results or you can check the patient portal.
common_questions.referrals: We can provide referrals to specialists when medically necessary. Discuss with your provider during your visit.
common_questions.medical_records: Request medical records through our patient portal or by calling +1-555-123-4570. There may be a processing fee.
common_questions.patient_portal: Register for our secure patient portal at www.healthcareplus.com/portal to access records, results, and more.
common_questions.immunizations: We provide routine immunizations and travel vaccines. Call to check availability and schedule.
common_questions.lab_services: On-site laboratory services available. Most tests performed same-day with quick turnaround.
common_questions.languages: We have staff fluent in Spanish, Mandarin, and Hindi. Interpreters available for other languages.
